name: ArtDiscover
tag_list: art, contemporary-art, emerging-art, art-magazine, art-news, artist-bio, art-fairs
overview:
ArtDiscover is a free online guide to contemporary and emerging art, launched in December 2012.

Our mission is to facilitate access to art for the entire world. We are focused on providing users information about the most relevant art trends, emerging artists and exhibitions, events and art fairs worldwide.

Artists can promote themselves creating, editing and uploading their artworks for free on ArtDiscover. Artists and galleries can promote their profiles with their exhibitions, artworks or art events on ArtDiscover, creating a profile, editing and updating their info instantly on the site.

ArtDiscover is part of Open House Group, headquartered in Barcelona. The company was established in 1997, and made it through the websites GowithOh.com, Oh-Barcelona.com, Oh-Berlin.com etc… to one of the leading European companies for Vacation Rentals in City Break destinations.
